Key Learning Points: Scanning items, handling payments, processing discounts
Stock checks, restocking procedures, tracking shrinkage
Handling complaints, upselling, loyalty program details
Identifying theft, using security systems, reporting incidents
Unlocking/locking procedures, system startup/shutdown, security checks
Processing returns, verifying product condition, updating inventory
Picking orders, packaging, marking orders ready for pickup
Proper shelf stocking, labeling items, checking expiry dates
Setting up promotional displays, applying discounts, managing signage
Evacuation protocols, first aid basics, reporting emergencies
